description: Try our easy to follow Miso-Glazed Eggplant & Noodle Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: MisoGlazed Eggplant & Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add remaining miso mixture to cooked noodles and stir until dissolved. Divide between bowls, top with eggplant and serve with sesame seeds and green part of onion.
